resources.string: This is an app I made as a personal tool. I do not take responsibility if you happen to miss any lectures because of using this app. This app is also opensource. You will find the repository here: www.github.com/tobbentm.\n\nTo start, please add a class or course subscription:

You can find me at www.tobbentm.com
Repository for this app at www.github.com/tobbentm

Libraries used:
android-async-http
http://loopj.com/android-async-http/
